snippet: Major record labels are suing Internet radio giant Pandora for copyright infringement for using songs recorded before 1972 without paying license fees....

headline.print_headline: Record Labels Sue Pandora Over Older Songs
headline.main: Record Labels Sue Pandora Over Older Songs

lead_paragraph: Major record labels are suing Internet radio giant Pandora for copyright infringement for using songs recorded before 1972 without paying license fees.
